document_data.name: Saeval Calaudra
document_data.mainbody: '''Saeval Calaudra''' was a [[moon elf]] rogue and [[assassin]] and, as of [[1374 DR]], was a member of the [[Vel'Nikeryma]].
document_data.Activities: He offered support and expertise to [[Eldreth Veluuthra]] cells across [[Faer√ªn]] and introduced people to the Vel'Nikeryma. As of 1374 DR he was the youngest member of the organization.
